tautology in simple words is saying the
same thing twice in a sentence but in
two different ways it is the unnecessary
repetition of words but you may say who
does that why would we repeat words in a
sentence well for two reasons either you
are repeating words in a sentence
without realizing it or you are using
repeated words to make a point perhaps
like for example the sentence it was
deja vu all over again something that's
deja vu means it's an event happening
again so if you've already experienced
the exact same situation twice
it would be fine to say it was deja vu
but to say it was deja vu all over again
would be a tautology since what you're
literally saying in the situation is
that something happened again again if
you were to literally translate this
sentence same with these terms VIN
number pin number an ATM machine VIN
number stands for vehicle identity
number pin number stands for your

terms the words number and machine

abbreviated words hence making saying
the word number again in VIN and pin and
machine after ATM making them
tautologies so what are the other

said which in fact are the unnecessary
repetition of words in a sentence in

any sentences you say in your daily life

realizing it so come on let's find out
